Reviews.Title: Okay...
Reviews.Author: Samantha B.
Reviews.Content: I got this for my business. There is nothing bad about it, but it needs to be hooked up to a sort of recording system, which I wish they had said in the description. I bought just this so I am sending it back because I don't want to get a whole separate recording system. It would be nice if they included all the other things you need to buy in order for it to be set up. Also the instructions it comes with is very limited.

Reviews.Title: Works well for the money...
Reviews.Author: Casey
Reviews.Content: It's hard to argue with the simplicity or the price point for this camera. However, playback formatting is .3gp, which means you have to either convert it or convince others to install VLC or another video playback suite that can process the images. Otherwise, this works as advertised and we are happy with it.

Reviews.Title: all in one camera
Reviews.Author: Richard Meyer
Reviews.Content: this camera will come in handy. last year on two different occasions we had someone set fire to the waste paper baskets in our restrooms at our campground luckily someone saw the smoke and put them out before it set the whole building afire . we can mount this camera outside under the eves and see who comes and goes and what time they were there if it happens again this year.. then we will have some evidence on them. I haven't used this camera yet but I'm sure it will be just what we need
